__comment: This file contains spoiler-free data for Mistborn5.

descriptions.text: Waxillium Ladrian, a Roughs lawman turned nobleman, strives to maintain order in Elendel.
Waxillium Ladrian, still the lawman‑noble, struggles as old instincts clash with new responsibilities.
Waxillium Ladrian, the relentless lawman at heart, finds his dual worlds increasingly entangled.
Waxillium Ladrian, the steadfast lawman‑noble, faces the most personal test of his commitment to justice.
Wayne, Wax’s irreverent partner from the Roughs, is a master of disguise and banter.
Wayne, the mischievous sidekick, uses humor and trickery to help Wax solve crimes.
Wayne, still the quick‑witted partner, proves his loyalty beneath the jokes.
Wayne, the loyal partner and trickster, shows his heart even in the darkest moments.
Marasi Colms, a determined law student, now works with the constabulary on important cases.
Marasi, the driven law officer, becomes increasingly integral to Wax’s work.
Marasi, still the ambitious investigator, proves her courage as tensions escalate.
Marasi Colms, the resolute investigator, takes bold steps to uphold the law.
Steris Harms, Wax’s meticulous fiancée, approaches life with careful planning.
Steris, still the precise fiancée, offers surprising support beneath her reserved demeanor.
Steris Harms, the ever‑prepared partner, shows her worth in unexpected ways.
Steris, Wax’s steadying partner, becomes an anchor through chaos.
MeLaan, a curious young kandra, aids Wax and his allies with her unique skills.
MeLaan, the spirited kandra, plays a larger role in unraveling the case.
MeLaan, still the bold kandra, proves her resourcefulness again and again.
MeLaan, the loyal kandra, helps Wax confront truths both painful and vital.
Ranette, the sharp‑tongued weaponsmith, remains reclusive but skilled.
Ranette, the solitary weaponsmith, supplies Wax with vital tools.
Ranette, still the inventive weaponsmith, arms the crew for growing dangers.
Ranette, the unflappable weaponsmith, remains indispensable in the fight.
Tillaume, Wax’s efficient butler, discreetly tends the Ladrian household.
Tillaume, the loyal butler, manages the home while events spiral.
Tillaume, still the quiet butler, continues to support Wax.
Tillaume, Wax’s faithful butler, remains steady amid turmoil.
Lord Harms, Steris and Marasi’s father, values propriety and alliances.
Lord Harms, the cautious nobleman, observes the city’s unrest with concern.
Lord Harms, still the protective father, tries to steady his family’s position.
Lord Harms, the head of his household, holds firm in uncertain times.
Claude Aradel, Elendel’s constable‑general, works to keep the city stable.
Aradel, the pragmatic constable‑general, seeks Wax’s help in difficult cases.
Aradel, still the steady lawman, faces the strain of mounting unrest.
Claude Aradel, the calm leader, holds the line when order falters.
Captain Brettin, a city constable, dutifully serves under Aradel.
Brettin, the diligent captain, supports Wax’s efforts as danger rises.
Brettin, still the stalwart captain, holds to his duty despite strain.
Captain Brettin, the loyal constable, remains committed to the law.
Bleeder is a mysterious assassin, striking fear in Elendel with bold attacks.
Bleeder, the elusive killer, manipulates the city’s fears with cunning.
Bleeder, still the dangerous assassin, leaves Wax grasping for answers.
Bleeder, the relentless foe, brings Wax to his most difficult confrontation.
Harmony, the unseen godlike force, watches over the world quietly.
Harmony, the guiding presence, speaks to Wax in moments of need.
Harmony, still the unseen guide, urges Wax toward difficult choices.
Harmony, the enduring presence, reminds all of a greater balance at play.
Suit, Wax’s uncle, remains a shadowy noble with secret dealings.
Suit, the calculating uncle, maneuvers behind the scenes.
Suit, still the manipulative nobleman, reveals ties to wider plots.
Suit, the scheming uncle, continues pulling strings in the dark.
The Set is a secretive organization whispered about in hushed tones.
The Set, the covert group, grows more ominous as its reach is hinted at.
The Set, still secretive, emerges as a driving force behind chaos.
The Set, the hidden power, stands revealed as a dangerous influence.
TenSoon, a loyal kandra, is mentioned as a trusted figure of the past.
TenSoon, the respected kandra, briefly aids Wax’s path.
TenSoon, still the loyal kandra, appears at a key moment.
TenSoon, the faithful kandra, remains a symbol of trust.
Telsin Ladrian, Wax’s sister, is mentioned only in passing.
Telsin, the distant sister, lingers on the edges of Wax’s thoughts.
Telsin Ladrian, still largely absent, is a quiet part of Wax’s past.
Telsin, Wax’s elusive sister, steps closer to the story’s heart.
Various nobles appear in salons and gatherings, shaping polite society.
The nobles, the background figures, murmur about the city’s unrest.
The nobles, still distant, continue their social maneuvering.
The nobles, the city’s elite, remain largely detached from events.

recaps.Prologue: A glimpse into the past shows old choices shaping the world Wax now lives in.
recaps.1: Wax is drawn into another troubling case as unrest simmers in Elendel.
recaps.2: Wax and Wayne investigate a shocking crime scene, uncovering disturbing clues.
recaps.3: Marasi takes on more responsibility as the investigation expands.
recaps.4: Wax faces tensions between his noble life and his lawman instincts.
recaps.5: An attack rocks the city, revealing a cunning enemy at work.
recaps.6: Wax follows the trail of evidence, finding the case more complex than expected.
recaps.7: The city’s fear deepens as the mysterious killer strikes again.
recaps.8: Wayne uses his unorthodox methods to pry information from reluctant sources.
recaps.9: Marasi’s insight uncovers hints of a larger plot beneath the violence.
recaps.10: Wax clashes with political powers while pressing for answers.
recaps.11: Harmony’s voice offers guidance, though Wax questions the cost.
recaps.12: A lead points Wax and his allies into increasingly dangerous territory.
recaps.13: MeLaan steps in to help, showing the importance of her unique skills.
recaps.14: Wax uncovers more about the enemy’s motives as pressure mounts.
recaps.15: A sudden attack pushes the team to rethink their strategy.
recaps.16: Secrets about the city’s unrest begin to surface.
recaps.17: Wax faces hard truths about those he trusts.
recaps.18: The case grows darker as the assassin’s actions escalate.
recaps.19: Wax and Wayne close in on the truth, though danger looms.
recaps.20: Events spiral toward a confrontation that cannot be avoided.
recaps.21: Wax races to stop a looming disaster in the city.
recaps.22: A tense encounter raises more questions than answers.
recaps.23: Wax pushes through personal doubts to keep pursuing justice.
recaps.24: Allies pull together as the enemy’s plan comes to light.
recaps.25: Wax and his team uncover the final threads of the plot.
recaps.26: The assassin’s motives are revealed in stark terms.
recaps.27: Wax confronts the mastermind in a dangerous standoff.
recaps.28: The aftermath brings both resolution and painful truths.
recaps.29: Shadows linger as the stage is set for what’s to come.
